divs: Sighting DetailsI was looking in the sky about miles from the church at night and saw a disc figure. At first i thought it was in my head but got my cousin and he said bhe sees it to. Then about 20 mintues later it flew away fast!
trends: There have been 9 other sightings in Leominster
There was one other sighting in Leominster on or around February 27th 2008
Summary: not realy bright with a goldish color in the sky and not noisy
